issue.title: [CF 390] Custom Sounds - Cant get them working
issue.body:
I have a created a custom sound but can get it working ( i can hear it).  Here's what I did

1.  I created both an .ogg or .mp3 sound
2.  put both in root of Wow or in customsounds folder off of Wow root
3.  created a spell cooldown - enabled the spell cooldown.
4. add a "start" sound ICON event.
5. no sound is produced when I click the test sound ICON but sounds are produced by pressing this same ICON on sounds that come with TMW

Note that the cooldown works just fine.  The ICON appear when the cooldown is over and disappears as soon as I "start" to use it.  Just can get the sounds to work.  Note that I can hear the out-of-the-box sounds that come with TMW.

IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Subsequently, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click on the arrow next to the editbox labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type (icon, group, or profile), and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

If you are experiencing errors that seem to be unrelated to icons, attaching a saved variables file will increase the likelihood of your problem being solved. Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua". Screenshots can be especially helpful if your issue is hard to describe in words.

FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE ABOVE INSTRUCTIONS WILL RESULT IN YOUR TICKET BEING INVALIDATED.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.  create an .ogg or .mp3 sound
2.  put it in root of Wow or in customsounds folder off of Wow root
3.  create any spell cooldown - enable it,
4. add a "start" sound ICON event
5. no sound is produced when I click the test sound ICON but sounds are produced by pressing this same ICON on sounds that come with TMW

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
sound should play and be heard

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.7.1

Do you have an error log of what happened?
Where would this be?  I checked the TellMewhen folder?

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
I both tested the sound using your ICON and tried to create the sound when not in configuration mode.  Neither worked.  I tried it in the root and in a customsounds folder using the relative path you sugges.


> Posted by CurseForge user tiwebber | Imported from CurseForge issue #390 | Raw

Did you restart WoW after placing the sounds in the folder? WoW will not recognize any files that are placed in its folder unless you completely exit game and restart it.
